MajorClaims.MC1: richer nations should take more responsibility for helping the poorer nations in all health, education and trade
MajorClaims.MC2: Poorer nations need help from richer nations in these areas to develop their countries

Claims.C2: richer nations can contribute by delegating doctors and nurses to these power nations as well as donate money to build hospitals
Claims.C3: richer countries can allocate experienced educators to train more teachers and lecturers in poorer countries
Claims.C4: for the issue of education fee, richer countries should offer scholarships and loan to the qualified students
Claims.C5: in the area of trade, no one can deny that poorer countries are lagging behind richer countries due to shortage of money

Premises.P5: education for these countries normally is not free so only certain group of students can afford it
Premises.P6: Trading are less active in poorer countries may also be caused by incomplete transportation infrastructure
